			[1665] tabpanel 'Details'
				[1673] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1676] list ''
					[1677] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Add instant freshness to a bare space in your home or office with the help of this artificial dracaena plant boasting a rich overgrowth of bright, lifelike leaves stemming from delicate, bendable branches that fan out at different heights and designed with a natural-like quality that makes it look incredibly realistic. Standing 3’ high from an accompanying nursery planter, this artificial dracaena plant will provide a beautiful touch of year-round freshness to any space you desire. Silk plants are manufactured using synthetic materials, such as polyester material or plastic, and are well designed and constructed to be life-like in appearance. This item will need to be re-shaped when removed from the secure box to allow it to reach its fullest size. Your artificial plant will look beautiful for years to come; simply wipe clean with a soft dry cloth when needed. About Nearly Natural Inc. - For over 75 years, Nearly Natural Inc. has been providing conscientious consumers with beautiful alternatives to natural decorations. Employing and advised by naturalists who understand the live plant world, Nearly Natural is able to recreate the most realistic-looking decorative items for homes, offices, and businesses. Driven by a true commitment to customer service, attention to detail, and natural philosophy, Nearly Natural strives to bring customers the most beautiful, unique, and striking faux plants and floral on the market. MATERIALS:Iron Wire, Cement, PU, PE'
					[1679] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Add instant freshness to a home or office with this artificial dracaena plant boasting an overgrowth of lifelike leaves stemming from bendable branches that fan out at different heights and designed with a quality that makes it look real. Stands 3’ high from an accompanying nursery planter.'
					[1681] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Shop with confidence knowing our collections... "look so real, they\'re Nearly Natural!" ; We source products with a sound and in-depth knowledge of our industry...Nature.'
					[1683] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Overall Product Dimensions: 13in. W x 13in. D x 36in. H ; Base Dimensions: H: 5 In. W: 6 In. D: 6 In. ; Measurements are from the bottom of the base to the furthest outstretched dimension on the plant. Width dimensions are also calculated from each furthest outstretched dimension'
					[1685] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'NO MAINTENANCE REQUIRED - No Watering or Trimming. Looks full and fresh every day'
					[1687] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Looks real to the naked eye ; Easy and effortless ; Provides year-round greenery ; Contained in an accompanying nursery planter ; Recommended for indoor use only ; Artificial plants are manufactured using synthetic materials and are well designed and constructed to be life-like in appearance ; Item will need to be re-shaped when removed from the box; this plant can easily bend for reshaping purposes - please separate and fluff the stems and leaves to achieve desired fullness'

step_data.thought:
I can see from the accessibility tree that I am now viewing the product page for the '3ft. Dracaena Artificial Plant (Real Touch)'. This is a Home & Kitchen product, specifically a home décor item. The product details show:

1. Price: $49.87
2. It's in stock
3. SKU: B08DP3XK3T
4. Detailed product description mentioning it's an artificial plant that looks realistic, stands 3' high, and comes with a nursery planter
5. Product dimensions: 13 x 13 x 36 inches
6. Weight: 5.2 pounds
7. Manufacturer: Nearly Natural

Since my goal was to shop for Home & Kitchen products, I have successfully accomplished this by:
1. Navigating to the Home & Kitchen category
2. Exploring the Home Décor Products subcategory
3. Viewing a specific Home & Kitchen product in detail (the artificial plant)

I have thoroughly explored the Home & Kitchen section and have detailed information about a specific product. I can see options to add this item to cart, add to wish list, or continue browsing. Since I've successfully completed the goal of shopping for Home & Kitchen products, I should inform the user about what I've found.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully shopped for Home & Kitchen products. I navigated to the Home & Kitchen category, explored the Home Décor Products section, and examined a 3ft. Dracaena Artificial Plant (Real Touch) priced at $49.87. This realistic-looking artificial plant stands 3 feet tall, requires no maintenance, and comes with a nursery planter. The product has detailed specifications and appears to be in stock if you wish to purchase it.')
